DISCORD_API_TOKEN.description: Discord API token used to authenticate and log in the Discord client/service.

DISCORD_APPLICATION_ID.description: Discord application ID for the bot

CHANNEL_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of Discord channel IDs that will be parsed into an array if provided.

DISCORD_TEST_CHANNEL_ID.description: Discord channel ID used during test suite to locate the test channel for sending messages, voice interactions, and other test operations.

DISCORD_VOICE_CHANNEL_ID.description: ID of the Discord voice channel the bot should join when scanning a guild. If not supplied, the bot selects a channel based on member activity.

DISCORD_SHOULD_IGNORE_BOT_MESSAGES.description: If true, the bot will ignore messages from other bots. Can be overridden by character settings.

DISCORD_SHOULD_IGNORE_DIRECT_MESSAGES.description: If true, the bot will ignore direct messages. Can be overridden by character settings.

DISCORD_SHOULD_RESPOND_ONLY_TO_MENTIONS.description: If true, the bot will only respond when explicitly mentioned. Can be overridden by character settings.

DISCORD_LISTEN_CHANNEL_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of Discord channel IDs where the bot will only listen (not respond).
